name: yupp
description: This is a social media app, using this app user can share those ideas with others. In this app user make their personal profile and connect with others like a facebook. User can chat with each others and also upload posts. In this app user can like, commnt to other posts and so more. If i talk about User Interface then This app have quality in it with attractive animations and lottie files.
author: Malek Arsil
